verses.roman:
tabe ta' ācārya kahe vinaya kariñā
dina dui-cāri raha kṛpā ta' kariñā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; ta'-certainly; ācārya kahe—Advaita Ācārya says; vinaya kariñā—offering all respect; dina dui-cāri—another two or four days; raha—kindly remain; kṛpā—mercy; ta'-certainly; kariñā—showing.
translation: After that, Advaita Ācārya respectfully requested Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu to show Him mercy by remaining another two or four days.
